transcript.text: Hey there, good to see you again. What’s been going on?
Yeah, thanks. I’ve just been so drained lately, it’s hard to get through the day.
That sounds tough. How long has this been happening?
Probably the last couple of weeks, maybe longer. I didn’t really notice at first.
Anything else along with the fatigue? Like fever, night sweats, weight loss?
Not really. I mean, I might’ve dropped a pound or two but I haven’t been checking.
And how’s your sleep been?
It’s okay. I fall asleep fine but wake up a lot at night.
Do you feel rested at all when you wake up?
Not really, no. I still feel wiped out.
Any stress at work or home that’s been on your mind?
A little. Work’s been hectic, but nothing crazy.
How about your appetite? Eating okay?
Yeah, no change there.
Any dizziness, palpitations, or shortness of breath?
Once or twice I felt a bit lightheaded standing up, but it passed.
Okay. Are you still taking the iron supplements I prescribed last year?
Honestly, I kind of stopped a few months ago. They were upsetting my stomach.
Got it. Thanks for being honest. Let’s do some labs — iron, thyroid, maybe B12 too.
Alright. I just want to figure this out, it’s really wearing me down.

result.information: Fatigue for the last couple of weeks, waking up a lot at night, not feeling rested, slight weight loss, lightheadedness when standing up, stopped taking iron supplements due to stomach upset.
